text: Wo ba tamen fencheng shi'er ge buluo. Dang mu sa de zuren xiang ta yao shui shi, wo qishi ta:“Ni yong ni de shouzhang da na kuai yanshi ba!” Yushi bian cong na kuai yanshi zhong yong chu shi'er dao quanshui, mei ge buluo dou zhidao ziji de yinshui chu. Wo rang yun gei tamen zhe yin, you jiang gei tamen “man na [zhu]”[mi yiban tian de jiao zhi wu] he anchun [bing shuo]:“Nimen chi wo suo ci gei nimen de jiamei shiwu ba!” Tamen meiyou sunhai wo, dan tamen yi shi ziji shou sun.
